channel.title: Gargantua stomp effect
channel.description: The Gargantua in Half-Life 1 had a stomp effect that sent a red beam through the ground, killing anyone in its path. I think Valve just didn't have the resources, but intended for this stomp to create a ripple, or some kind of crack in the earth (think earthquake) that uprooted and killed everyone around the Gargantua or in its direct path. What're you guys doing with this? The effect could even be replaced with simply crushing a patron into mush, similar to the way Striders worked, though obviously less piercey, more crushy.
